wikipedia_page.main: Georgina Anderson (22 October 1998 – 14 November 2013) was a singer from Marske-by-the-Sea, Teesside. On 14 November 2013 she died after being diagnosed with stage four liver cancer. Her posthumous 2013 single, "Two-Thirds of a Piece" reached number 63 on the UK Singles Chart.

response: * Singer and songwriter Georgina Anderson, who died from cancer in 2013 at the age of 15, came from Marske and attended Bydales Secondary School.
Singer and songwriter Georgina Anderson from Marske, also attended Bydales.
*14 November – Georgina Anderson, singer, 15 (liver cancer)Georgina Anderson: Teenage musician who died of cancer hits iTunes charts and receives Simon Cowell backing
